lite.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: used in the names of some food or drink products to mean that they have fewer calories or less fat than other similar products
lite.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: not as serious as the real thing, or less extreme
lite.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Some people see cohabiting as marriage lite.
lite.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: used in the name of some food and drink products that have less fat or fewer calories than similar products
